channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Data Virtualization on Cloud Pak for Data
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Data Virtualization on Cloud Pak for Data

item.title: CVE-2021-38971|2024-08-04T01:51:20.825Z -- ibm -- data%20virtualization%20on%20cloud%20pak%20for%20data
item.description: IBM Data Virtualization on Cloud Pak for Data 1.3.0, 1.4.1, 1.5.0, 1.7.1 and 1.7.3 could allow an authorized user to bypass data masking rules and obtain sensitve information. IBM X-Force ID: 212620.
